title: Add 'ticker context' CLI command
description:
Implement the CLI command for managing epic context documents.

## Commands
- `ticker context <epic-id>` - Generate context (if not exists)
- `ticker context <epic-id> --show` - Display existing context
- `ticker context <epic-id> --refresh` - Force regeneration
- `ticker context <epic-id> --delete` - Remove context file

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Command registered in cmd/ticker/main.go
- [ ] Validates epic-id exists
- [ ] Default action: generate if missing, show if exists
- [ ] --show flag prints context to stdout
- [ ] --refresh flag regenerates even if exists
- [ ] --delete flag removes context file
- [ ] Appropriate exit codes (0 success, 1 error)
- [ ] Progress output during generation

## User Experience
- Show spinner during generation
- Print token count after generation
- Colorized output for --show
